CustomDomainListScreen.title: Custom Domains
CustomDomainListScreen.desc: You can add a custom domain so that users will login via, for example, “identity.yourdomain.com”. In this case, a session cookie of domain “yourdomain.com” is written so that your websites can share the session cookies under “*.yourdomain.com” for better customers experiences.
CustomDomainListScreen.delete-domain-dia: Are you sure you want to delete {domain}
You have no permission to delete domain
PublicOriginConfigurationScreen.title: Public Origin
PublicOriginConfigurationScreen.desc: Pick a verified domain here as the public origin of your app. The public origin will appear in the messages sent from the app, e.g. reset password emails.
VerifyDomainScreen.title: Verify Domain
VerifyDomainScreen.desc-main: Setup CNAME and add TXT record below to your DNS provider to verify your own
